Package org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors.impl

Internal classes implementing reactors(beta).

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlockingReactorImpl
    The internal implementation of BlockingReactor.
    Inbox
    Provides at least two queues for a targetReactor's incoming messages, where the first queue is a concurrent linked queue for messages passed from other reactors and the other(s) are local queues for messages that are passed using the targetReactor's own thread.
    IsolationInbox
    The inbox used by IsolationReactor, the next request is not made available for processing until a result is assigned to the previous request.
    IsolationReactorImpl
    Internal implementation of UnboundReactor.
    NonBlockingInbox
    The inbox used by NonBlockingReactor, ThreadBoundReactor and SwingBoundReactor.
    NonBlockingReactorImpl
    Internal implementation of NonBlockingReactor.
    Outbox
    An outbox holds a collection of send buffers.
    ReactorImpl
    Base class for internal reactor implementations.
    SwingBoundReactorImpl
    A reactor bound to the Swing UI thread.
    ThreadBoundReactorImpl
    A reactor bound to a thread.
    UnboundReactorImpl
    Common code for NonBlockingReactor and IsolationReactor, which are not bound to a thread.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MigrationException
    Signals a migration of the current thread to another targetReactor.

Package org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors.impl Description

Internal classes implementing reactors(beta).
